  "description": "Zojatech Limited - we are a digital transformation consultancy and software development company that provides revolutionary and effective software solutions to businesses. Our goal is to provide software solutions that streamline work processes, enhance work productivity, enable business scalability and shape our clients as innovative leaders of their industry.

At Zojatech, we consider ourselves your partners, and we take care of your technology so that you can focus on your business. The goal of every member of our team is to make your business challenge-free, maximize your productivity, enable you to better serve your customers, and, most importantly, enable the digital success of your business

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Head of Engineering

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	As the Head of Engineering, you will be responsible for directing, administering, and coordinating the entire Product &amp; Engineering business (Zojatach/Zojapay) in accordance with policies, goals, and objectives established by the CEO.
	You will oversee ongoing core business operations within the company.
	Assist the Chief Technical Officer in the development of enterprise/organization policies and goals that optimize financial and corporate performance and facilitate the growth of the company.
	You will be responsible for developing, leading and managing all commercial activities of the business, as well as including market competitiveness, product definition/pricing and distribution/diversity strategies.
	You will be accountable for the effective and efficient technical operations of the company and for managing all operational risks to reduce their negative impacts to as low as reasonably possible.
	You will ensure that all technical operational controls are in place and working, and that the enterprise works in compliance with all related regulations.


Responsibilities


	Deep Understanding of enterprise-grade technologies.
	Experience in building and running distributed systems for 24x7 online services at scale. - Deep understanding &amp; expertise with highly transactional, large relational and complex systems.
	Knowledge of Object-Oriented Design, data structures, algorithm design, and complexity analysis.
	Experience in defining and executing professional software engineering best practices for the full software development life cycle. Strong analytic and quantitative skills; ability to use hard data and metrics to back up assumptions, recommendations, and drive actions.
	Strengths in problem-solving, issue resolution, ability to work in a deadline-driven work environment, attention to detail, and ability to multitask.
	Strong verbal and written communication skills with demonstrated experience. Engaging and influencing peers and executives.
	A strong sense of ownership, urgency and drive.
	Being a strong leader, mentor, and people manager.&nbsp;
	Startup and Entrepreneurial Mindset.
	Execution oriented.
	Ability to think big. - Collaborative mindset.
	&nbsp;Types of applications built: Mobile Apps, Websites, API Applications - Backend: Laravel (PHP), MySQL. - Architecture: Microservices / Serverless with AWS and Azure. - Frontend: React, React Native, Redux.&nbsp;
	Regulatory Compliance: - Stay informed about regulatory changes and compliance requirements in the financial services industry (Nigeria and major Global markets).
	Ensure that the platform complies with all relevant laws and regulations.
	Set up best practices for development and champion their adoption.
	Oversee the Architecture &amp; design of technically robust, flexible and scalable solutions.
	Technology Strategy and Leadership: Develop and execute the technology strategy in alignment with the company&#39;s goals.
	Provide visionary leadership to the technology team, fostering a culture of innovation and excellence.
	Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies to drive continuous improvement. Set up the organization &amp; processes to enable the timely delivery of projects with high quality.
	Engage with product management and CTO to drive the functionality, usability and other non-functional requirements and hence the solution for the same.
	Ensure on-time launches by managing design, development, and integration efforts according to a standard or customised project plan.
	Show strong business and technical judgment that will accelerate the time to market of releases, while incrementally moving our services towards the long-term vision.
	Ensure the security, scalability, and reliability of our platform.
	Team Management: - Build and lead a high-performing technology team, providing mentorship, guidance, and professional development opportunities for the engineering team.
	Foster a collaborative and inclusive work environment that encourages creativity and problem-solving.
	Be a champion of engineering excellence: establish team metrics for measurement of engineering and operational excellence.
	Implement a consistent, regular process for assessment and improvement.


Requirements


	University Degree in Computer Science, Technology-related courses, Engineering, or other numerate disciplines
	Minimum 10 years in an ICT Operating environment with hands-on experience on Application Solutions, Sales, Business Process,
	Certification in Product Management, Software Engineering, Sales, Business Process Automation and Business Development.
	Master&rsquo;s Degree in Business Administration, Economics, Finance, Information Technology or related fields from a recognized University will be an advantage.
	Qualification in a recognized framework for IT service delivery, ITIL, Business process automation and Business Development certification
	Membership of professional management associations will be an added advantage
	Designing, Business Development, Research and executive management and at least 6 years in senior management positions


The competence proficiency levels required for the position of Chief Business Officer are defined using the following key terms:


	Leadership &ndash; Mastery
	Business Development &ndash; Skill
	Commercial activities - Skill
	ICT Industry knowledge- Mastery
	Technical Skills- Mastery
	Credibility - Mastery
	Adaptability- Mastery
	Teamwork &ndash; Mastery
	Self-Motivation &ndash; Mastery&nbsp;
	Interpersonal skills - Mastery
	Project Delivery and Management &ndash; Mastery
	Innovation &ndash; Mastery
	Strategy &amp; Planning --
	Awareness of a&nbsp;good understanding of what is involved in an area of expertise and its relevance to the business;
	Ability to describe the main elements of the area of expertise and their importance to the business; and
	Ability to recognize how and where competences in the area of expertise are relevant to their own job.
	Knowledge of the Ability to interpret and evaluate information and advice from experts in an area of Expertise;
	Knowledge and ability to use correctly the terminology (vocabulary) of the area of Expertise;
	Ability to hold an informed debate with experts in the Area of Expertise, and the Ability to ask questions that test the viability of proposals in an Area of Expertise
	Skill of Ability to consistently carry out the activities of an area of Expertise to the required standard;
	Ability to perform satisfactorily the majority of activities of the Area of Expertise;
	Ability to translate guidelines and standards for the Area of Expertise into practical actions;
	Ability to solve imaginatively common technical /operational problems in the Area of Expertise, and
	Ability to guide and advise others in operational /technical aspects of the Area of Expertise.
	Mastery of the Ability to diagnose and resolve significant, unusual problems and to successfully adapt aspects of an Area of Expertise;
	Ability to creatively solve significant, complex, non-routine problems in the Area of Expertise;
	Ability to adapt practices from other markets or countries for use in the Area of Expertise; and
	Ability to generate substantial improvements to local practices and procedures for the Area of Expertise.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;career@zojatech.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

	The accountant is responsible for maintaining accurate financial records, preparing financial statements, overseeing daily accounting operations, and ensuring compliance with regulatory and tax obligations.
	The ideal candidate should have strong experience in financial reporting, cash flow management, and accounting for foreign currency transactions typical of BDC operations.

	Support procurement and vendor payment processes by verifying invoices and preparing payment vouchers.
	Maintain an organized filing system of all financial documents for audit readiness.

	3&ndash;5 years of relevant experience, preferably in a financial service or BDC environment.
	Professional certification like ICAN, ACCA.
	Knowledge of Crypto, USDT, is an added advantage.
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian tax laws, CBN guidelines, and FX transaction accounting.
	Proficient in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Sage, or similar tools).
	Excellent attention to detail, analytical skills, and integrity.
	Strong communication and organizational skills.
	Female candidate preferred


Salary

Key Responsibilities


	Maintain proper books of accounts using approved accounting software.
	Record daily forex transactions, cash inflows/outflows, and bank reconciliations.
	Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements (P&L, balance sheet, cash flow).
	Ensure accurate recording of FX gains/losses and revaluations.
	Ensure compliance with CBN financial reporting standards and applicable BDC financial regulations.
	Assist in managing liquidity to support daily FX operations.
	Reconcile bank accounts and maintain proper records of forex purchases and sales.
	Implement financial control procedures to reduce fraud and financial misstatements.
	Assist in internal and external audits, ensuring timely provision of supporting documentation.
	Prepare and submit statutory tax filings including VAT, WHT, PAYE, and company income tax in liaison with tax consultants or auditors.
	Assist in the preparation and submission of financial returns required by regulatory authorities such as FIRS, CBN, and CAC.
	Monitor and project daily cash balances, including foreign and local currency positions.
	Monitor expenditure to ensure alignment with approved budgets.
	Process staff payroll and maintain accurate records of salaries, benefits, and statutory deductions.
	Support procurement and vendor payment processes by verifying invoices and preparing payment vouchers.
	Maintain an organized filing system of all financial documents for audit readiness.


Qualifications and Experience


	Minimum of a B.Sc. or HND in Accounting, Finance, or related discipline.
	3–5 years of relevant experience, preferably in a financial service or BDC environment.
	Professional certification like ICAN, ACCA.
	Knowledge of Crypto, USDT, is an added advantage.
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian tax laws, CBN guidelines, and FX transaction accounting.
	Proficient in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Sage, or similar tools).
	Excellent attention to detail, analytical skills, and integrity.
	Strong communication and organizational skills.
	Female candidate preferred


Salary
N250,000 - N400,000 monthly.

Front Desk & Customer Support Officer Job at Coinbox Limited




        
    

        
        Coinbox Limited is a multi-dimensional Consulting Firm which provides one - stop total business development and support to our vast clientele of start-ups, Small, Medium, growing and Large Enterprises, Cooperative Societies, Groups and Associations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk & Customer Support Officer

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Front Desk & Customer Support Officer serves as the first point of contact for clients and visitors, ensuring a welcoming experience while managing inquiries and supporting basic operational needs.
	The role also includes handling the company's social media presence by creating, scheduling, and responding to content that promotes the brand and engages clients.
	The ideal candidate is customer-focused, well-spoken, tech-savvy, and organized.


Key Responsibilities


	Welcome clients and visitors warmly, directing them to appropriate departments or staff.
	Manage the front office phone lines, respond to walk-in inquiries, emails, and WhatsApp messages promptly and professionally.
	Schedule client appointments and maintain an organized visitor log.
	Handle incoming and outgoing correspondence and deliveries.
	Maintain a tidy and presentable front office area.



	Respond to customer inquiries about forex services, rates, requirements, and complaints via in-person, phone, email, or chat.
	Provide basic information on KYC documentation and onboarding steps.
	Follow up on customer service requests and feedback to ensure satisfaction.
	Assist operations team in logging transaction inquiries and client requests.



	Manage the company’s official social media platforms (Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, WhatsApp Business, etc.).
	Create and schedule engaging content (e.g., exchange rate updates, service promotions, FAQs, testimonials).
	Monitor online engagement and respond to DMs, comments, and tags in a timely, professional manner.
	Escalate sensitive online feedback or complaints to management or compliance as needed.


Qualifications and Experience


	Minimum of OND/HND/BSc. in Mass Communication, Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field.

	Knowledge of Crypto, USDT, is an added advantage.

	Strong customer orientation and problem-solving abilities.
	Friendly demeanor, well-groomed appearance, and a good command of English.
	Ability to multitask and remain calm under pressure.
	Female candidate preferred

Facility / Administrative Officer Job at Max Drive




        
    

        
        Max Drive - We are a team of passionate people and a leading technology-enabled company driven by a vision to solve the mobility challenges in Africa. We want to get people and goods to their destinations hitch-free. It is personal for us because we understand the frustration of epileptic transportation. We are making mobility safe, affordable, accessible, and sustainable through the deployment of high-performance technologies and operators.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Facility / Administrative Officer

Job Location: Sango-Ota, Ogun 
Job type: Full time (On-site)

Job Description
     

            
    




	Plan and coordinate installations and refurbishments e.g. heat, electricity, water, etc.
	Coordinate maintenance of all appliances
	Manage the upkeep of equipment and supplies to meet health, safety, government and environmental standards
	Procurement of office items especially admin and cleaning tools at best prices
	Ensure the safety and security of facility before closing for the day
	Ensure the office is opened early in the morning and all facilities are operating as expected
	Maintain the office and ensure that the office is clean at all times
	Organization of company facilities and errands
	Supervise cleaning activities
	Inspect the buildings' structures to determine the need for repairs or renovation
	Control activities like parking space allocation, waste disposal and building security
	Allocate office space according to needs
	Ensure that security men are at all times functioning at their duty posts
	Supervise all facilities staff (custodians, cleaners, security, groundskeepers, technicians, etc.) and external contractors
	Advising business on increasing energy efficiency and cost-effectiveness
	Draft reports and making written recommendations
	Planning and forecasting future needs or repairs
	Agree and oversee contracts with providers of service(s)
	Review utilities consumption and strive to minimize costs.
	Keep financial and non-financial records
	Create and manage a facility budget (including costs for repairs and procurement)•Ordering of office supplies
	Handle insurance plans and service contracts
	Procurement of office items especially admin and cleaning tools at best prices


Requirements


	A degree in related fields, minimum of a HND
	4 years and above work experience
	Proven experience working in a similar role and knowledge in administrative or operational role
	Demonstrated high computer literacy: particularly with programs in Microsoft Office
	Ability to develop and maintain good working relationships
	Ability to manage complex workload
	Technical knowledge of building services
	Problem Solving, Multi-tasking skills
	Reasonable degree of Computer literacy
	Detail oriented and organized
	Team work
	An ability to prioritize, plan and organize work in a busy environment
	Commercial awareness
	Record/book keeping skills
	Interpersonal and communication (verbal and written) skills.


Benefits


	Competitive pay & benefits
	Premium Health insurance cover
	Consistent Learning and Development.
